levels.beginnerDescription: Start your English learning journey with basic concepts
levels.elementaryDescription: Build your foundation with essential grammar and vocabulary
levels.intermediateDescription: Advance your skills with complex structures and expressions
levels.advancedDescription: Master advanced concepts and achieve fluency

dashboard.title: English Course
dashboard.subtitle: Practice with our intelligent revision system
dashboard.practiceDaily: Practice daily with our interactive method for fast results

howItWorks.title: How the Learning System Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Understand how to make the most of your English learning journey

spacedRepetition.title: Spaced Repetition
spacedRepetition.description: Our system uses spaced repetition techniques to optimize your learning. Cards appear at the ideal moments to maximize retention.

levels.title: Progressive Levels
levels.description: Start at Beginner level and gradually advance to Elementary, Intermediate, and Advanced. Each level unlocks after completing the previous one.

step1.title: Choose a Lesson
step1.description: On the dashboard, click on a Beginner level lesson to start. Lessons are unlocked sequentially.

step2.title: Practice the Cards
step2.description: See the question on the front of the card, think of the answer, and click to reveal. Rate your difficulty using the buttons: Again, Hard, Good, Easy.

step3.title: Complete the Lesson
step3.description: After practicing all cards in the lesson, it will be marked as completed and cards will enter the review system.

again.title: Again
again.description: Didn't know the answer. Appears in 1 minute.

hard.title: Hard
hard.description: Knew it, but it was difficult. Appears in 6 minutes.

good.title: Good
good.description: Knew it well. Appears in 10 minutes (first time) or 1 day (second time).

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: After completing a lesson, cards enter the review system. The algorithm calculates when each card should appear again based on your difficulty rating.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: Track how many answers you got right

lessons.title: Completed Lessons
lessons.description: See how many lessons you've finished

reviews.title: Pending Reviews
reviews.description: How many cards are ready for review

consistency.title: Be Consistent
consistency.description: Practice a little every day instead of a lot at once

honest.title: Be Honest
honest.description: Rate your difficulty correctly to optimize the system

timing.title: Respect the Intervals
timing.description: Don't force reviews before time - the system is optimized

review.title: Review Regularly
review.description: Use the "Review All Lessons" button to review due cards

progress.title: Lesson Progress
progress.subtitle: Track your learning journey
progress.dataNotAvailableDescription: We couldn't load your progress data. Please try again.

basicGreetings.title: Basic Greetings
basicGreetings.description: Learn essential greetings and polite expressions

numbersAndTime.title: Numbers and Time
numbersAndTime.description: Master numbers, time expressions, and basic counting

familyAndRelationships.title: Family and Relationships
familyAndRelationships.description: Learn family members and relationship vocabulary

foodAndDrinks.title: Food and Drinks
foodAndDrinks.description: Learn to talk about food, drinks and preferences

pastSimple.title: Past Simple - Regular Verbs
pastSimple.description: Learn to describe actions that happened in the past

presentPerfect.title: Present Perfect
presentPerfect.description: Learn to talk about experiences and recent past
